amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Immigration and Customs Enforcement by $41 million to facilitate agreements under the 287(g) program for state and local law enforcement training, and agreements to enforce Federal immigration law.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funds (by offset) for Immigration and Customs Enforcement by $41 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe amendment (A016) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Poe.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Poe amendment (A016) Failed by voice vote.
